group_1.narration: [textBlack:Dance dance dance,@And chase each other's tails,@Two dogs run round in circles,@Racing to be the best.]
[textBlack:Combo combo combo,@And chase each other's tails,@Dogs merry-go-round in circles,@And run in search of love.]

group_1.textRight: Hell yeah!

group_1.textLeft: I knew we could do it!

group_1.textRight: There's our comeback!@We're back on top of the world.

group_1.textLeft: ...I get it now! The secrets is in "combos"!

group_1.textRight: Exactly.
Rather than matching the song exactly,@if you match your partner...
Pulling off a series of synchronized combos@seems to get you a higher score.

group_1.textLeft: Does the real arcade work that way too?

group_1.textRight: I don't know...@But it works that way here in the dream.

group_1.textLeft: ...The Sayaka-Kyoko pair don't@seem to have a stable score.

group_1.textRight: That's because of how they do things.
Kyoko, as the more advanced dancer,@can land all of her moves perfectly.
If Sayaka could keep up, their score@would be incredible, but...

group_1.textLeft: Kyoko doesn't seem to plan on@moving in time with Sayaka.

group_1.textRight: That's right, so their score@depends on Sayaka's efforts.
But Madoka and Homura, on the other hand...
They must have been focused on matching@up their timing for combos.
I'm sure that's how they managed@to boost their score so suddenly.

group_1.textLeft: If it's about teamwork,@the two of us are unbeatable!

group_1.textRight: That's right, after all...
We're the duo that made the best@chocolate cake in the universe.

group_1.textLeft: You said it!
So, let the training begin!
[chara:200450:effect_emotion_surprise_0][chara:200652:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...Huh?!

group_1.textRight: Mami's team suddenly shot right to the top!

group_1.textLeft: Madoka's team passed 2 million points too...@They're getting better...

group_1.textRight: Hmmm, they're good.

group_1.textLeft: Maybe...they're going for a combo score...

group_1.textRight: Our rivals are catching up, it's lighting a flame in me.
We can't see their faces, but it's still@pretty fun to face off like this!

group_1.textLeft: ...Kyoko, I'm sorry.
We had a good mood going at first,@but I'm dragging you down, aren't I?
If you were on your own,@you could get a perfect score.

group_1.textRight: No, you're doing great for a newbie, really.
And the better you get, the higher our score will go.
We can still turn this around.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, we'll just keep doing things@the way we have been.
You don't have to worry about@trying to match with me, alright?

group_1.textRight: ...Sounds good!@I won't show any mercy!

group_1.textLeft: Sayaka's team is in the lead again!

group_1.textRight: That's incredible...!
That's almost a perfect score!

group_1.textLeft: I can't accept this.
Here we are trying to save Sayaka and Kyoko...
And they're doing everything@in their power to stop us!

group_1.textRight: It can't be helped.@They don't even know it's a dream.

group_1.textLeft: To give up on best chocolate cake in the universe,@and accept the ten chocolate coins...
Is that the message that they're trying to send us?

group_1.textRight: ...I'm not so sure about that.

group_1.textLeft: But I don't want to@end up losing like this either!

group_1.textRight: I know...
But if we're going to turn things around from here,@we can't just go for combos.
We both have to move perfectly to the song.

group_1.textLeft: In that case...
Let's swap to a song that both of us are good at!

group_1.textRight: ...Is there such a song?

group_1.textLeft: We'll look for one together!
This song will work!

group_1.textRight: I didn't think it would be here.@We really are in a dream.
We're almost at the end.
Once we decide on our song,@there'll no turning back.

group_1.textLeft: That's the plan!

group_1.textRight: Alright then, we'll make one last push.

group_1.textLeft: Let the training commence!
